property.name: loadNotificationSettingsQuery
property.value: SELECT ns.id, ns.template_id, ns.threshold, ns.resend_delay, ns.informed_user_ids, ns.keep_informed_admins, ns.keep_informed_owner, ns.enabled, ns.statuses_to_inform FROM pipeline.notification_settings ns WHERE ns.id = ?

property.name: loadAllNotificationSettingsQuery
property.value: SELECT ns.id, ns.template_id, ns.threshold, ns.resend_delay, ns.informed_user_ids, ns.keep_informed_admins, ns.keep_informed_owner, ns.enabled, ns.statuses_to_inform FROM pipeline.notification_settings ns

property.name: updateNotificationSettingsQuery
property.value: UPDATE pipeline.notification_settings SET template_id = :TEMPLATE_ID, threshold = :THRESHOLD, resend_delay = :RESEND_DELAY, informed_user_ids = :INFORMED_USER_IDS, keep_informed_admins = :KEEP_INFORMED_ADMINS, keep_informed_owner = :KEEP_INFORMED_OWNER, enabled = :ENABLED, statuses_to_inform = :STATUSES_TO_INFORM WHERE id = :ID

property.name: createNotificationSettingsQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO pipeline.notification_settings ( id, template_id, threshold, resend_delay, informed_user_ids, keep_informed_admins, keep_informed_owner, enabled, statuses_to_inform) VALUES ( :ID, :TEMPLATE_ID, :THRESHOLD, :RESEND_DELAY, :INFORMED_USER_IDS, :KEEP_INFORMED_ADMINS, :KEEP_INFORMED_OWNER, :ENABLED, :STATUSES_TO_INFORM)
